ComicInfo.Summary:
The great Science Fiction/Fantasy anthology series continues with the debut of Howard Chaykin's Gideon Faust.
1) Editorial: Friedrich (1 page text article)
2) Gideon Faust, Warlock At Large: Wein, Chaykin (12 pages)
3) The Gods Of Mount Olympus In Ancient Mythology: The Beginning Of all Things: Achziger, Staton (16 pages)
4) A Nice Place To Live, But…: Brunner (1 page)
5) Mandy, The Girl With The Most Comics In America: Workman (1 page)
6) Waters Of Requital: Marrs (8 pages)
7) Linda Lovecraft: Midnight In The Medina: Skrenes, Vosburg (10 pages)
*Chaykin would bring back Gideon Faust for two more adventures, both appearing in Heavy Metal in 1979 and 1981.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-07 16:45:31. [CVDB16529]
ComicInfo.Writer: Frank Brunner, John Workman, Lee Marrs, Len Wein, Mary Skrenes, Mike Friedrich
ComicInfo.Penciller: Frank Brunner, Howard Chaykin, Joe Staton, John Workman, Lee Marrs, Mike Vosburg
ComicInfo.Inker: Frank Brunner, Howard Chaykin, Joe Staton, John Workman, Lee Marrs, Mike Vosburg
ComicInfo.Characters: Apollo, Artemis, Atlas, Ceres, Eros, Gaea, Gideon Faust, Hades, Hera, Hermes, Hyperion, Linda Lovecraft, Mars, Minerva, Oceanus, Poseidon, Rhea, Saturn, Tethys, Typhon, Uranus, Venus, Vesta, Vulcan, Zeus
ComicInfo.Teams: Gods of Olympus, Nymphs, Roman Gods, Titans of Myth
